Title: The trade-offbetween transceiver capacity and symbol rate
Abstract: © OSA 2018.The achievable throughput using high symbol rate, high order QAM is investigated for the current generation of CMOS-based DAC/ADC. The optimum symbol rate and modulation format is found to be 80GBd DP-256QAM, with an 800Gb/s net data rate.
